title: baiters/advance_fee/sources/scamorama/larzlo-smith.html
notes:
Frank Larzlo is back with a masterclass in fun time-wasting! Here he makes beautiful use of the Fake Form modality.


Frank  last appeared in if you want to send a message, use western union and HOWDJA LIKE THEM APPLES?.

to me



Nov 26



YAHOO MSN/LOTTERY INCORPORATION
119 GLOUCESTER PLACE LONDON

YOUR E-MAIL ADDRESS HAS WON 1,000,000.00 GBP AT THE (YAHOO/MSN) AWARD THIS YEAR LOTTERY PROMO. FOR CLAIM CONTACT DR PEDRO WILLIAMS. E-MAIL: (mrlokosmiths1@hotmail.com) PLEASE PROVIDE THE REQUIRED INFORMATION BELOW:


YOUR NAME:
AGE:
CITY
NATIONALITY:
OCCUPATION:

messages.body:
to me





Dec 6 (6 days ago)



Dear respected Sir,


This is to confirm the receipt of your e-mail.
We had a discussion with the bank payment department, they need your delivery address so that they will send you a MASTER CARD through DHL COURIER SERVICEfor you to use and withdraw your money in your Country.
Kindly send your 


1)full name
2)Copy of Identity
3)Delivery address with area postal code
4)Direct telephone number


This process will cost you you £500 GBP to cover both cost of DHL COURIER SERVICE AND INSURANCE.
And you are required to send the cost through WESTERN UNION MONEY TRANSFER with the information of our secretary:-


Mr. Tom Alex
City: London
Country: United Kingdom.


Scan and send the payment slip alongside with the above required 4 information/s


Regards,
Management

to Loko


 

Dec 6 (6 days ago)




Dear Sir,


Will I be able to withdraw the sum of 1.000.000 GBP with this Master Card? Can they not just transfer it to my bank account? Would this not be safer?


I have no problem to pay this small fee of 500 GBP but I am concerned about the security involving this amount of money.


Please reply ASAP in order to move forward with this transaction.


Kind regards,


Franz

NOW I UNDERSTOOD, THANKS MR LOKO FOR THE NICE EXPLANATION...

messages.body:
to Loko


 

Dec 7 (5 days ago)



Dear Sir,


Thanks for your advice.


I have been to a local Western Union office and I had a nice talk with the shop attendant. She has explained me the way it works and now everything seems to be clear for me.


The only point that concerns me is that she has mentioned some fraud cases by using this way of payment. She invited me into her office, offered me a cup of thee and some cookies while she explained me the security systems.


In fact I have learned that they have many technologies that they use to help safeguard our personal information including Secure Socket Layer (SSL). The locked padlock you see in the bottom of your browser window tells you that we're encrypting the information coming back and forth across our connection. 


So I am ready for this first Western Union experience. The sum to be sent is 500 GPB but they said that there is a charge to be deducted so I believe that you will receive around 450 GBP. Will that be ok for you? Yes I know, it is expensive, but it is fast and it is secure!


They also mentioned a secret question. Could you give me any idea? And I need more detailed address of the receiver (Mr. Tom Alex).


As soon I've got your message, I will move to the western union office again. Maggy will be glad to seeing me again.

 
Cheers.
messages.raw:
Frank Larzlo

to Loko

They also mentioned a secret question. Could you give me any idea? And I need more detailed address of the receiver (Mr. Tom Alex).

As soon I've got your message, I will move to the western union office again. Maggy will be glad to seeing me again.

Cheers.

messages.body:
to Loko


 

Dec 8 (4 days ago)



Dear Mr. Loko,


Ok, so now I understand it. You need to receive 500 GBP so in fact I have to pay the cost, right? This means it will cost me 500 GBP + the tax. Maybe it will cost to me 550 GBP right?


But this is not an issue, once my friend Larry will borrow me 300 GBP and I have 250 GBP in my wallet. He has no idea that I have won this prize! I told him that I need this money for personal reason.


The only problem is that I need to pay him back on Tueasday 13/12. Do you think that by Tuesday this Master Card will be with me? Cause I need to pay him back 320 GBP...That was the condition, otherwise he would not borrow me.


Please confirm, cause if I fail the payment to Larry, it will cost me another 30 GPB extra. 


This is urgent.


After having received your delivery date, I will go to the local Western Union office in my town.

 
Kind regards and many thanks for your assistance.

Frank Larzlo

messages.body:
to Loko


 
Dec 10 (2 days ago)



Dear Mr. Loko,


Probably the copy which I have sent you was useless, I agree.


No worry, by monday this will be fixed! They will give me a duplicate.


By the way, is my account loaded??


Since I've won this prize I have bought a nice car but the car dealler wants the payment by Tuesday as well. Will it be on time??


Mr. Loko, please do not fail sending this card or I will be in deep trouble...


Mr. Harry from the pub was here with the bill of the party, Mr. Grahna from the local drink store as well...In fact I couldn't wait and I have already around 34.000 GPB of unpaid bills since I have won the prize...


Now I need to pay this people...


So Monday new copy to you, Tuesday the card with me, ok?

 
Mr Loko, thanks for being so helpful and I wish you a nice weekend.
messages.raw:
Frank Larzlo

to Loko

Dec 10 (2 days ago)

Dear Mr. Loko,

Probably the copy which I have sent you was useless, I agree.

No worry, by monday this will be fixed! They will give me a duplicate.

By the way, is my account loaded??

Since I've won this prize I have bought a nice car but the car dealler wants the payment by Tuesday as well. Will it be on time??

Mr. Loko, please do not fail sending this card or I will be in deep trouble...

Mr. Harry from the pub was here with the bill of the party, Mr. Grahna from the local drink store as well...In fact I couldn't wait and I have already around 34.000 GPB of unpaid bills since I have won the prize...

Now I need to pay this people...

So Monday new copy to you, Tuesday the card with me, ok?

Mr Loko, thanks for being so helpful and I wish you a nice weekend.

Dear respected Sir,


Your ATM MASTER CARD will be dispatched immediately the courier charge and insurance cover fee is cashed.
Then you will get the delivery within 24hrs.


Thanking you,
Management.
